title: Our Forefathers

tokens.lyric: Our forefathers built for us a beautiful land;

lines.raw: [F]Our forefathers built for us a beautiful land;

tokens.lyric: Till it is completed, we will join in heart and hand.

lines.raw: [C7]Till it is completed, we will join in heart and hand.

tokens.lyric: See the new eternal history, beckoning us to come

lines.raw: [F]See the new eternal history, beckoning us to come

tokens.lyric: Quickly on the journey to the true eternal home.

lines.raw: [Dm]Quickly on the journey to the true eternal home.

tokens.lyric: How the beauty of our native land lifts us to the skies;

lines.raw: [C]How the beauty of our native land lifts us to the skies;

tokens.lyric: God has surely chosen this eternal paradise.

lines.raw: [F]God has surely chosen this eternal paradise.
